Pacman.Model
Class Player

java.lang.Object
  Pacman.Model.GameCharacter
      Pacman.Model.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, GameCharacterInterface
public final class Player
extends GameCharacter

The player class. It contains information about the player's position and motion states, among others.

See Also:

simulateStep

boolean simulateStep(Vector position,
                     Vector newDirection)
To check if there will be a collision on the next step, a proxyPlayer is generated to simulate the step without the actual player actually moving.

Specified by:
simulateStep in class GameCharacter
Parameters:
position - The position of the GameCharacter.
newDirection - The direction to go.
Returns:
true, if GameCharacter can do a step without colliding.

void stop()
Sets active to false so the thread doesn't keep moving the player

collision

postStepEffects

private void postStepEffects()
Eating dots and adding points to Game.score.

ghostCollision

private boolean ghostCollision()
Checks if the player is currently colliding with a ghost. If that is the case and special item mode is active, the ghost dies. If they collide and special mode is inactive, the player dies and the game is over.
